channel.title: Montréal Métro Speedruns
channel.description: A feed providing updates on Métro speedruns in Montŕeal, QC.
channel.copyright: Public domain, baby. Lap it up! By ahc.

item.title: New EXO+STM 100% record!
item.description:
Andrew Wang set a new EXO+STM 100% record on Monday (2025-04-14), with a time from first doors close to last door open of 34h51!</description
Update WR

item.title: New STM+REM 100% record!
item.description: Ellie set a new STM+REM 100% record on Monday (2024-12-16), with a time of 3h26m55s!

item.title: New STM 100% record!
item.description: alice, and cat set a new STM 100% record on Monday (2024-12-16), with a time of 2h43m24s!

item.title: New STM 100% run!
item.description: Asa, Blair, and Ellie logged a new STM 100% attempt on Tuesday (2024-12-10), with a time of 3h08m02s, putting them in 3rd place.

item.title: New STM 100% Record!
item.description: Ellie set a new STM 100% record on Friday (2024-11-15), with a time of 2h52m26s! Congradulations!

item.title: Init
item.description: The initialization of this site with current rules and known records.
